```scss
// Property: drawerLockMode
// Description: Get or set the drawerLockMode
// Component(s): Ti.UI.Android.DrawerLayout
'.drawer-lock-mode-locked-closed': { drawerLockMode: Ti.UI.Android.DrawerLayout.LOCK_MODE_LOCKED_CLOSED }
'.drawer-lock-mode-locked-open': { drawerLockMode: Ti.UI.Android.DrawerLayout.LOCK_MODE_LOCKED_OPEN }
'.drawer-lock-mode-undefined': { drawerLockMode: Ti.UI.Android.DrawerLayout.LOCK_MODE_UNDEFINED }
'.drawer-lock-mode-unlocked': { drawerLockMode: Ti.UI.Android.DrawerLayout.LOCK_MODE_UNLOCKED }
```
